name: Tower Tussle
description:
It's WRECKER versus FIXER in a furious brawl over COMPLETE DESTRUCTION or GLORIOUS REPAIR-EDNESS!! The Wrecker must destroy the tower before the time is up. Repairer, use your repair arm to keep that tower alive!

Tower Tussle is local versus multiplayer, requires either two controllers OR a shared keyboard and mouse to play.

Keyboard Controls:
Press X to close instruction screen

Player 1:
WASD to move
Q, E to raise and lower repair tool

Player 2:
Arrow keys to move
Move mouse cursor to swing ball

Controller:

Both players:
Analog sticks for movement and action
